already_exists_for_user: Personal data already exists for user

sms.already_sent: SMS already sent. Wait for it to arrive and validate the code
sms.sent_exceeded: Number of SMSs sent exceeded. Wait 7 days to create a new code
sms.attempts_exceeded: Number of SMSs and attempts exceeded. Wait 7 days to create a new code
sms.attempts_for_this_sms_exceeded: Number of attempts for this SMS exceeded. Ask for another SMS
sms.error_more_than_2_sms_in_7_days: An error occurred earlier and more than 2 SMS were sent in the last 7 days
sms.error_no_successful_sms_in_7_days: No successful SMS has been sent in the last week. Request a new SMS
